 I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָקֹב‎</span> **adjective** 

**1.** ==insidious, deceitful==, [[Jer.17.9|Jer 17:9]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָקֹב הַלֵּב מִכֹּל‎</span>. 

**2.** ==foot-tracked== (denominative from I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָקֵב‎</span>) [[Hos.6.8|Hos 6:8]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גִּלְעָד קִרְיַת פֹּעֲלֵי אָוֶן עֲֹקֻבָּה מִדָּם‎</span>. 



 II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָקֹב‎</span> **adjective** ==steep, hilly== (see √; compare <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***difficult mountain path***, Qor 90:11 <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***hill***); — [[Isa.40.4|Isa 40:4]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎והיה הֶעָקֹב לְמִישׁוֺר‎</span> let the ***steep ground*** (Chronicles) become a plain (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָֽרְכָסִים‎</span>). compare [[Eccl.6.20|Eccl 6:20]].
